name: Colin Mayfielkd
coverLetter:
I have accumulated several years worth of trimming cannabis. From cutting down whole plants, trimming fan leafs, trimming wet bud, shucking nugs off of branches and trimming dry bud. I understand the whole scope of cultivating, drying, packaging, and selling flower although this job only focuses on trimming.

I have my Marijuana workers permit, and I am available to start tomorrow!
I have reliable transportation and can trim 20 oz's in 8 hours if the bud is right. I personally own 5 sets of trimming scissors so i can bring one with me if needed.
